title: Overwatering
description: Too much water can lead to root rot. Most plants prefer soil that dries slightly between waterings.

title: Insufficient Light
description: Placing plants in dark corners prevents photosynthesis. Know your plant's light requirements.

title: Wrong Pot Size
description: Using pots that are too big or small can affect root health and water retention.

title: Neglecting Humidity
description: Tropical plants need higher humidity. Dry air can cause leaf browning or drop.

title: Ignoring Pest Signs
description: Small pests can quickly damage plants. Regularly inspect for spots, webbing, or sticky residue.

title: Using the Wrong Soil
description: Different plants need different soils. For example, succulents need well-draining mixes.
